jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro terraform % terraform plan -out=tfplan

╷
│ **Error: Missing resource instance key**
│
│   on api_gateway.tf line 242, in resource "google_api_gateway_gateway" "api_gateway":
│  242:   api_config   = google_api_gateway_api_config.api_config.id
│
│ Because google_api_gateway_api_config.api_config has "count" set, its
│ attributes must be accessed on specific instances.
│
│ For example, to correlate with indices of a referring resource, use:
│     google_api_gateway_api_config.api_config[count.index]
╵
jesselarose@Jesses-MacBook-Pro terraform %
